fr.zcraft.quartzlib.core

Class QuartzComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.zcraft.quartzlib.core.QuartzComponent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Commands, Configuration, ConfigurationInstance, CraftingRecipes, ExternalPluginComponent, Gui, I18n, SidebarScoreboard, Worker

    public abstract class QuartzComponent
extends Object
    This abstract class represents a QuartzLib component that needs to be loaded and/or unloaded.

      QuartzComponent()

      protected org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin getPlugin()
      Gets the plugin owning this component.
      boolean isEnabled()
      Checks if this component is enabled or not.
      protected void onDisable()
      Called when this component is disabled, while the parent plugin is itself disabled.
      protected void onEnable()
      Called when this component is enabled, while the parent plugin is itself enabled.
      void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Enables (load) or disable (unload) this QuartzLib component.

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Checks if this component is enabled or not.
        Returns:

        public void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enables (load) or disable (unload) this QuartzLib component.
        Parameters:
